DOC.brief_summary: This study design characterize regional distribution [ 11C ] ABP688 brain positron emission tomography ( PET ) .
DOC.brief_title: Characterize Regional Distribution 11C ABP688 Brain Positron Emission Tomography ( PET )
DOC.criteria: Male female subject 5580 ( inclusive ) Subjects good health At screening : oral body temperature 3537.5C systolic blood pressure : 90140 mm Hg diastolic blood pressure : 5090 mm Hg pulse rate : 4090 bpm Female subject child bear potential must use doublebarrier local contraception Postmenopausal woman must menstrual bleeding Subjects must weigh least 50 kg All subject must provide informed consent All subject must able communicate well investigator Specific Major depression disorder ( MDD ) Patients show follow level symptomatology : HAMD ( 17item scale ) > 16 CGI > 4 ( moderately ill ) Specific criterion healthy volunteer : Presence and/or history clinically significant major neurological psychiatric disorder Specific criterion MDD patient : Presence and/or history clinically significant major neurological psychiatric disorder MDD generalize anxiety disorder Axis I comorbidity exclude except anxiety spectrum disorder Criteria : Smokers Pregnancy Subjects history symptoms/complaints consistent mild cognitive impairment Use psychotropic prescription drug Coffee consumer 6 cups/day Participation clinical investigation Donation loss 400 mL blood Significant illness within 2 week prior dose A known hypersensitivity study drug MRI scan show evidence stroke Any surgical medical condition might significantly alter distribution Clinical evidence abnormal lab value History immunodeficiency disease Positive Hepatitis B surface antigen Presence contraindication PET scan investigation Presence contraindication MRI investigation Evidence Allen test incomplete communication History drug alcohol abuse Current use anticonvulsant Significant radiation exposure Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
